auth.requiredError: Please enter your email and password.
auth.invalidError: We couldn't sign you in with those details. Please try again.
auth.success: You have been signed in successfully.
auth.errorGeneric: Something went wrong while signing you in.
auth.logoutMessage: You have been signed out successfully.
auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
auth.socialTitle: Sign in with your favorite provider
auth.socialSubtitle: We'll redirect you to finish authentication.
